name: SAT benchmarking tools
short_description:
SAT Solving Algorithms benchmarking tools

The purpose of these tools is to
  - generate random instances of boolean formulae
  - benchmark the performance of the standard SAT algorithms on them

These tools were created as a part of the work

"SAT Solving Algorithms: A survey and comparison"

which is its author's bachelor's thesis.


Martin Šrámek
Faculty of Mathematics, Physics and Informatics
Comenius University in Bratislava, Slovakia
2012
